title: Bandicam v2.4.0.895 + Key {B4tman}
description:
Bandicam v2.4.0.895 + Key {B4tman}
 
http://s9.postimg.org/nly2pu8a7/Bandicam_2_1_3_757.jpg 
http://s23.postimg.org/lkg3z7wxn/image.png

Description:-

The most advanced desktop and game recording software on the planet. The Bandicam program makes it possible to record a certain area on a PC screen, or on a program that uses the DirectX/OpenGL graphic technologies.

Bandicam will help you carry out a video record with high compression ratio, while keeping the video quality closer to the original work, and provides performance far superior to other programs that provide similar functions.

Features:-

Video recording of games and streaming videos:-

â€¢ Recording of WOW, Minecraft, and various Windows programs
â€¢ MPEGâ€¢1, Xvid and MJPEG video codec support
â€¢ PCM and MPEGâ€¢1 Layer II audio codec support
â€¢ AVI video format (.avi) support
â€¢ MPEGâ€¢1 video codec VBR mode support

Image capturing of games and streaming videos:-

â€¢ BMP, PNG and JPEG image format support
â€¢ Continuous image capturing

Frame rate control (FPS) management:-
â€¢ FPS overlay
â€¢ FPS limit

Key features of Bandicam:-

â€¢ You can upload the recorded file to YouTube directly (without converting).
â€¢ The recoded file size is much smaller than other capture programs (1/5~1/20).
â€¢ The maximum file size is unlimited as long as the local Hard Disk has free space available (over 1TB/7days).
â€¢ It has less lag than other capture programs (Bandicam uses much lower CPU/GPU usage).
â€¢ Bandicam can record video at resolutions up to 2560?1600 in high quality (1080P full HD video can be made).

What can be recorded through the Bandicam App:-

â€¢ Various 2D/3D games: WOW, StarCraft 1,2, Minecraft, RuneScape, Aion, MapleStory, Second Life, Age of Conan, EverQuest, etc
â€¢ Internet TV streaming videos: YouTube, BBC, CNN, Internet lectures
â€¢ Streaming video play program: iTunes, Windows Media Player, Real, GOM
â€¢ Various Window programs: PowerPoint, Excel, Firefox, Messenger
â€¢ Desktop Screen, Skype Video chatting, Webcam, HDTV, Java/Flash games, other 3D applications.

What's New in v2.4.0.895:-

â€¢ Bandicam is now able to record DirectX 12 games/programs.
â€¢ Bandicam now supports the Nvidia NVENC HEVC encoder.
â€¢ High Efficiency Video Coding (aka. HEVC, H.265) is available with an .MP4 container.
â€¢ Bandicam no longer supports Windows XP.
- Only 'Bandicam 2.3.1' for Windows XP.
â€¢ Bugs fixed:-
- Sequence number file naming didn't work properly in 'Screen Recording' mode.
- Wrong area was recorded after switching from fullscreen mode to a size preset.
- Other minor bugs fixed
